actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States in order to suspend until the close of December 31, 1975, the duties on certain insecticides.

summary.text: Suspends until the close of December 31, 1975, the duties on specified insecticides under the Tariff Schedules of the United States. (Amends 19 U.S.C. 1202)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States in order to suspend until the close of December 31, 1975, the duties on certain insecticides.
